title: Victoria Beckham shares glimpse at her behind the scenes pampering session in New York
text:
She recently shared some of her beauty secrets on an interview on ITV's This Morning.

And Victoria Beckham has shared a glimpse of herself getting pampered ahead of a photoshoot in New York City on Thursday.

The fashion designer, 45, donned a white dressing gown for the snap as she sat in the make-up chair with blotches of make-up on her face and her hair slicked back.

Beauty: Victoria Beckham, 45, shared a glimpse of herself getting pampered ahead of a photoshoot in New York City on Thursday

Alongside the snap, she wrote: 'Kisses @fulviafarolfi x shoot day in NYC #victoriabeckhambeauty'.

The Spice Girl was also busy promoting her clothing line during her visit to the Big Apple as she shared looks from her autumn winter collection on Instagram.

In one outfit, Victoria donned a cream blazer and matching skirt with a dark lined print along with a vermilion blouse with her brunette locks styled into a ponytail.

Victoria recently appeared on This Morning in a pre-recorded segment, where she revealed she feels more confident in herself and spoke about how she used to have 'little paranoias' when she was younger.

Fashion: The Spice Girl was also busy promoting her clothing line during her visit to the Big Apple as she shared looks from her autumn winter collection on Instagram

Victoria said: '[I] definitely feel more confident now. Definitely. There were things that I used to, little paranoias that I used to have when I was younger about myself that I just don’t care so much about now that I’m older.

'You know, I think it’s about focusing on the good bits and just being kind to yourself, you know. I mean, I think everybody should be kind to themselves and kind to each other.'

On Tuesday, the fashion designer was quizzed by Hoda Kotb on the Today show about the 'secret sauce' that has kept her romance with husband David working for so long.

Past: Victoria recently appeared on This Morning where she revealed she feels more confident in herself now than when she was younger (pictured in 1997)

Admitting they always put their four children first, she said: 'The kids are our priority, everything we do revolves around the children. We both work really hard, we love what we do professionally.

Victoria was recently quizzed by Hoda Kotb on NBC's Today show about the 'secret sauce' that has kept her and husband David, 44, together for so long.

Admitting they always put their four children first, she said: 'The kids are our priority, everything we do revolves around the children. We both work really hard, we love what we do professionally.

'We support each other, we're very lucky to have found each other and lucky that we're growing together.'

The pair tied the knot in July 1999 and have children Brooklyn, 20, Romeo, 17, Cruz, 14, and Harper, eight, together.
